org.protune.core
Class ActionSelectionFunction

java.lang.Object
  org.protune.core.ActionSelectionFunction

public abstract class ActionSelectionFunction
extends java.lang.Object

NOTE: The signature of the method selectActions(Action[], Status) should most likely be changed.
After having identified the unlocked actions, a subset is chosen and executed according to the Negotiation Strategy. The class ActionSelectionFunction represents the function selecting this subset. Each concrete selection function should extend ActionSelectionFunction.

Author:
jldecoi
